technology.short_description: A pact with the Dark Gods should not be taken lightly.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Chaos Undivided
Army ability: "Chaotic Torment" when attacking
Attribute: Cause Fear for Aspiring Champions and Undivided Chosen units
All Authority: +1

technology.short_description: Khorne desires skulls, so gifts His followers with the initiative to find them. Every. Single. One.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Khorne
Passive ability: "Hellblade" for Aspiring Champions and Chosen of Khorne units
Khorne Authority: +1
Slaanesh Authority: -1

technology.short_description: Khorne savours every sacrifice, bestowing vengeful inspiration on His armies as reward.

effects.description: Khorne Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Khorne

technology.short_description: The bounty of souls sacrificed to the Blood God help spread the venomous seeds of His corruption.

effects.description: Khorne corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Khorne corruption: +2 for each active Gift of Khorne

technology.short_description: A bloody pact with Khorne shall gain his favour.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Exalted Bloodletters
Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Exalted Bloodletters units
Cooldown: -5 turns for The Blood God's Grudge

technology.short_description: Earn Tzeentch's favour and a further fractal of his power.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Exalted Pink Horrors
Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Exalted Pink Horrors units
Cooldown: -5 turns for The Curser's Boon

technology.short_description: All sacrifices are made under the banner of Slaanesh, filling the hearts of His warriors with pride.

effects.description: Tzeentch Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Tzeentch

technology.short_description: Enchanted idols sit atop the altar of sacrifice, exuding waves of pure corruption.

effects.description: Tzeentch corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Tzeentch corruption: +1 for each active Gift of Tzeentch

technology.short_description: Attuning with the energies of Chaos opens many doors in the mind.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Tzeentch
Ability: "Gate of Tzeentch" for Aspiring Champions units

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Pink Horrors

effects.description: Nurgle Authority: -1
Tzeentch Authority: +1

technology.short_description: Those sworn to the Lord of Murder rejoice in every drop of blood spilled.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Khorne
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Khornate factions for each active Gift of Khorne

technology.short_description: Khorne sends His Bloodletters forth, answering the call of His illustrious Champion.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Bloodletters units
Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Flesh Hounds units

technology.short_description: The Mark of Khorne burns the skin, a searing reminder of His rage.

effects.description: Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Khorne
Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Aspiring Champions units

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

technology.short_description: Tributes and monuments to the Dark Powers ensure the Chaos Gods' favour.

effects.description: Unlocks Hero recruitment and post-battle loot bonus effects for Altar Improvement buildings
Construction time: -20% for all buildings

technology.short_description: Once one bears the Mark of Tzeentch, their fate is forever changed.

effects.description: Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Tzeentch
Barrier hit points: +800 for Aspiring Champions

technology.short_description: The most powerful seers of Tzeentch divine the location of every sacrifice made in His honour.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Tzeentch
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Tzeentchian factions for each active Gift of Tzeentch

technology.short_description: The Whirling Destroyers of Tzeentch answer only to their God's most valued servants.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Flamers units
Gifted Units pool capacity: +3 for Pink Horrors units

technology.short_description: Perhaps the threat of a collar and chain would remind these lesser beings of their place.

effects.description: Request army cost: -25%
War co-ordination target cost: -25%

technology.short_description: All the forces of Chaos must unite, if the scourge of Order is to ever be undone.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Skaven, Beastmen and Norsca
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Skaven, Norsca and Beastmen for each active Gift of Chaos Undivided

technology.short_description: Stragglers will not be entertained. If you can't keep the pace, you are food for the Warhounds.

effects.description: Souls gained from battles: +20%

technology.short_description: Hellish Daemonic power always comes at great cost, but such monumental devastation is surely worth any price.

effects.description: Ward save: 15% for Chaos Warshrine units

technology.short_description: Many mortal minds have shattered in the face of these terrifying arcane engines of war.

effects.description: Ammunition: +15% for Hellcannon units
Reload time reduction: +15% for Hellcannon units

technology.short_description: Daemonic steeds are driven by unnatural hunger, carrying mortals sworn to Chaos into battle in search of prey.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Gorebeast Chariots, Doom Knights and Skullcrushers
Unit experience gain: +25% for Chaos Knights

technology.short_description: Engineers have perfected a wicked machine of war, drawn by fearsome steeds into the very heart of battle.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chaos Chariots and Hellstriders
Unit experience gain: +25% for Marauder Horsemen

technology.short_description: Let the Marauders gather under their Dark Masters' eternal gaze.

effects.description: Unit experience gain: +25% for Marauders

technology.short_description: Such a generous gift is the thousand twisted blessings. Think of all the needle-teeth and tentacles it bestows.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Forsaken
Attribute: Cause Terror for Chaos Spawn units
Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Spawn units

technology.short_description: A worthy Beastmaster needs no chains to direct the ferocious nature of his darling pets.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Chaos Warhounds and Feral Manticore units
Passive ability: "Gorefeast" for Chaos Warhounds and Feral Manticore units (Rank 4 and above)

technology.short_description: Such massive iron bands are a marvel to behold, lending strength to the swing of the most colossal creatures.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% for Chaos Trolls and Chaos Giant units
Missile resistance: 25% for Chaos Trolls and Chaos Giant units (Rank 4 and above)

technology.short_description: With age comes almighty power, as the Dragon Ogres of nightmare evolve to even greater strength and size.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Dragon Ogres and Dragon Ogre Shaggoths units
Charge bonus: +20% for Dragon Ogres and Dragon Ogre Shaggoths units

technology.short_description: Chaos Armour, inscribed with powerful litanies of hate, will glow hot and vengeful when struck.

effects.description: Unit Upgrades cost: -20% for all units
Armour: +10 for Chaos Warriors, Chosen, Chaos Knights and Aspiring Champion units

technology.short_description: The dark rites must be performed, if the chosen are to rise among the ranks of Ruin.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chosen
Unit experience gain: +25% for Chaos Warriors

technology.short_description: The Chaos Gods grow impatient. Lending a sliver of majesty, they enable their followers to march faster.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5% for armies
Battle reinforcement time: -50%

technology.short_description: Nurgle's presence can be felt at the altar of sacrifice, inspiring the hearts of His adoring followers.

effects.description: Nurgle Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Nurgle

technology.short_description: Corruption festers like a deadly contagion, with its price paid in a deluge of souls.

effects.description: Nurgle corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Nurgle corruption: +1 for each active Gift of Nurgle

technology.short_description: Nurgle's mark reeks of rot and decay, encapsulating the source of His power.

effects.description: Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Nurgle
Enables poison attacks for Aspiring Champions

technology.short_description: The arms of a Chaos Knight are imbued with a small but not inconsequential amount of Unholy power.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chaos Knights
Enables magical attacks for Chaos Knights units

technology.short_description: The brand of Slaanesh always stings, evoking wanton pleasure from pain.

effects.description: Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Slaanesh

Attribute: Strider for Aspiring Champions

technology.short_description: The screams of every sacrifice ring out for miles, their agony like music of inspiration.

effects.description: Slaanesh Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Slaanesh

technology.short_description: Souls are sent to Slaanesh alongside idols of corruption, allowing His influence to seep into the mortal plane.

effects.description: Slaanesh corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Slaanesh corruption: +2 for each active Gift of Slaanesh

technology.short_description: Madness and misery open the mind, making space for the gifts of Nurgle's blessing.

technology.short_description: Once earnt, Nurgle will be even keener for the Dark Master to spread his gifts.

Diplomatic relations: +15 with Slaaneshi factions for each active Gift of Slaanesh

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Daemonettes units
Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Seeker Chariots units

technology.short_description: The Prince of Pleasure rewards His faithful well, offering decadent reward for their service.
